author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HONE CONTINUES WESTWARD TOWARD THE HAWAIIAN ISLANDS...
summary:
...HONE CONTINUES WESTWARD TOWARD THE HAWAIIAN ISLANDS...
 As of 8:00 AM HST Fri Aug 23
 the center of Hone was located near 16.5, -147.0
 with movement W at 16 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1002 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Hone (CP1/CP012024)
